title: Hour 2 - Phil Mickelson at the US Open, NFL Rumors and Notes
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Phil Mickelson at the US Open, NFL Rumors and Notes
description:
Dan breaks down Phil Mickelson's appearance in front of the media at the US Open yesterday, and he addresses the latest NFL offseason rumors and player movement.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
